de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap

Class TopBoundedUpdatableHeap<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.Heap<O>
      • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.UpdatableHeap<E>
        • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.utilities.datastructures.heap.TopBoundedUpdatableHeap<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - Element type. Should be Comparable or a Comparator needs to be given.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TiedTopBoundedUpdatableHeap

    public class TopBoundedUpdatableHeap<E>
extends UpdatableHeap<E>
    Heap class that is bounded in size from the top. It will keep the bottom k Elements only.
    Author:
    Erich Schubert
